io.micronaut.http.server.netty.binders

Class PublisherBodyBinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.http.server.binding.binders.DefaultBodyAnnotationBinder<Publisher>
      • io.micronaut.http.server.netty.binders.PublisherBodyBinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnnotatedArgumentBinder<Body,Publisher,HttpRequest<?>>, ArgumentBinder<Publisher,HttpRequest<?>>, TypeArgumentBinder<Publisher,HttpRequest<?>>, AnnotatedRequestArgumentBinder<Body,Publisher>, BodyArgumentBinder<Publisher>, NonBlockingBodyArgumentBinder<Publisher>, RequestArgumentBinder<Publisher>, TypedRequestArgumentBinder<Publisher>

    @Singleton
public class PublisherBodyBinder
extends DefaultBodyAnnotationBinder<Publisher>
implements NonBlockingBodyArgumentBinder<Publisher>
    A Body argument binder for a reactive streams Publisher.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
